full_description:
Montech AIR X ARGB Diamonded Mesh Black ATX Mid Tower Gaming Case

Montech AIR X ARG Black ATX Mid Tower Gaming Case comes with a Unique Diamonded Mesh design. This Unique design case featured with Fine metal mesh front , Dustproof fine, Mesh dust screens, Compact ATX, Double USB 3.0 + Single USB 2.0, 200mm ARGB Fans x 2 + 120mm ARGB Fan x 1, Controller. In this case, All pre-installed fans have already connected with the controller. It is designed with a large surface metallic Diamond Mesh front with air intake mesh and two 200mm ARGB fans. Here, Included another 120mm ARGB fan for a total of three fans and a maximum air intake area for incredible cooling performance and the aesthetics to match.

Highly Functional Ports, I/O Design

The Montech AIR X Gaming Case, the Controller ports comes with 3 pin (ARGB) and 4 PIN (PWM), That can control all three included ARGB fans. This gaming case also supports up to 6 fans in total. This Gaming case also comes with USB3.0 x 2, USB2.0 x 1. The I/O is at the side.

Diamond Mesh Front and Dust Resistance

The Montech AIR X Gaming case is designed with a Beautiful Metallic Diamond Mesh Front panel, that creates a unique visual and enhances airflow. The Fine Mesh dust screens for the front Diamond Mesh, and magnetic top and the screens provide excellent dust resistance. it is easy to remove and cleaned, because it does not has any connecting wires with the front panel.

Super High Airflow for your PC

This Montech AIR X ARG ATX Mid Tower Gaming Case has two large 200mm ARGB Fans and a large area Diamond Mesh front and back 120mm ARGB output fans.

In this Montech AIR X gaming case, the ARGB fans have already connected to the controller. In this Gaming case, the ARGB fans can be fully customized and controlled by ARGB compatible mainboards (5V 3pin). It is easy to access and control the three fans through the LED button. This new Montech AIR X Gaming Case supports E-ATX (Up to 305mm Ã— 330 mm), ATX, Micro ATX, and Mini ITX Motherboard. The latest Montech AIR X ARGB Gaming Case has no warranty.

full_description:
MONTECH AIR 903 MAX Mid Tower Ultra-Cooling ARGB Gaming Case

The Montech AIR 903 series provides great compatibility, unparalleled airflow, meticulous attention to detail, and superior aesthetics. A mid-tower case with both liquid and air cooling capabilities. The top and front of this shell also have 360mm radiator supports. A superior air cooler with a height of 180mm. It sports an innovative mesh front panel with high-performance HP140 PWM fans for the best cooling performance. Vertical GPU Mounting is supported. Flagship 4090 graphics card room, as well as roomy cable management paths.2x USB3.0 ports and a USB Type-C port.

Maximize Airflow, Optimize Performance

Experience the cutting-edge AIR 903 case, which has a metal front panel with a mind-blowing 51% ventilation rate. It increases airflow for greater thermal performance and the best possible gaming experience.

Four pre-installed 140mm PWM fans

The AIR 903 case HP140 high-performance cooling fans which provides cooling power with adjustable spinning speed.

Unrestricted cooling capacity and customization options

AIR 903 provides the most airflow and adaptability, with room for up to 9 fans to be installed, substantial clearance for CPU tower coolers, and compatibility for 360mm AIO coolers at the front and top.

Give Yourself the Best Dust-Free Experience

It boasts an ideal airflow, quick-release construction that makes cleaning simple, and strategically positioned filters that provide thorough dustproof protection.

True E-ATX Compatibility

It supports E-ATX and SSI-EEB form factors, offering a streamlined installation process with pre-punched mounting holes and cable routing holes.

full_description:
Montech SKY TWO Blue ATX Mid-Tower Casing

The Montech SKY TWO Blue ATX Mid-Tower Casing is the second generation of the SKY series which is part of the high-end product range in the MONTECH family. SKY TWO has a brand-new configuration to match the goal of this series. Each aspect and the raw material is precisely picked to create a sumptuous experience for our users of our high-end product. The integrated front and side panels, the fine mesh that covers the entire bottom of the tower, and the high-efficiency pre-installed fans combine the usefulness and elegance that match up to our core value of design, while also satisfying all of the user's desires, whether for performance or appearance.

4 High-Performance ARGB PWM Fans

The Montech SKY TWO Blue Mid-Tower Casing incorporates RX120 ARGB PWM with the reversed fan blade particularly created for air intake from the side position and the PSU shroud without losing aesthetics. The enlarged drillings that cover the underside of the front panel to the PSU chamber increase airflow intake, and the inverted fans on the PSU chamber can efficiently suck air in to cool off the GPU.

Transformative Airflow Direction

The Montech SKY TWO Blue Mid-Tower Casing incorporates an entirely new airflow design. Two pre-installed fans with reversed fan blades for air intake on the side panel and an exhaust fan on the rear, as well as another reversed fan on the PSU chamber that directly cools the GPU. MONTECH eventually designed a new airflow system to optimize airflow after years of testing.

Next Gen High-End Supported

The Montech SKY TWO Blue Mid-Tower Casing can handle GPUs with lengths up to 400mm, CPU cooler height support up to 168mm, 210mm high wattage PSU, and abundant room for assembly.

Enjoy the Unobstructed Views

Thanks to the integrated front and side panels, users can see their whole interior at first sight. The fine mesh that covers the underside of the front panel extends to the PSU chamber with pre-installed ARGB fans that enhance the beauty of this masterpiece.

Comprehensive Dust-Resistant Design

The tailor-made dust-resistant top panel may be simply cleaned by removing the top panel. Removable dust filters are also installed on the input region adjacent to the motherboard and on the bottom to provide complete dust protection. The arrangement results in a pleasant user experience and a visually appealing PC.

Unimpeded Light Show

The AX120 and RX120 fans feature up to 21 lighting effects. Simply push the LED button to swap between effects or sync with the motherboard to design your lighting effect style to enjoy the spectacular light party.

Perfect Cable Management

The Montech SKY TWO Blue Mid-Tower Casing incorporates a novel cable management design with a unique cable channel and three Velcro strips that make administration easier than ever throughout the building process, resulting in a clean-looking PC.

Easy Top 360 Radiator

The Montech SKY TWO Blue Mid-Tower Casing Users may easily install an AIO liquid cooler on the top owing to the offset arrangement, which is meant to eliminate interference from other components like the motherboard and RAM.

Buy Montech SKY TWO ATX Mid-Tower Casing from the best Casing Shop in BD

In Bangladesh, you can get the original Montech SKY TWO Blue ATX Mid-Tower Casing from Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest Montech Casing to purchase for your Desktop PC. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. The Montech SKY TWO ATX Mid-Tower Case comes with no warranty.

Montech KING 95 PRO ATX Gaming Case White

The Montech KING 95 PRO ATX Gaming Case White stands out as a top-tier option for gamers with a variety of features that improve both performance and aesthetics. This case is adaptable for different construction combinations and is made to accommodate ATX, Micro-ATX, and Mini-ITX motherboards. In addition to providing efficient cooling, the pre-installed 140mm*2 Reversed ARGB PWM Fans also contribute to the visually pleasing atmosphere by generating customizable lighting effects. Customers may showcase their high-end components and careful cable management with a side panel made of tempered glass. One notable feature that lets users benefit from better thermal performance without sacrificing GPU space is compatibility with a 63mm-high water cooling solution. When the water cooling system is installed, the case can accommodate graphics cards measuring up to 275mm of GPU space. Prioritizing high airflow and supporting 120mm fans ensures that internal components remain cool, even under heavy gaming loads. The Montech KING 95 PRO is a unique option for gamers who value performance-driven design since it skillfully blends aesthetics and practicality. This gaming case offers the perfect framework for assembling a potent and aesthetically spectacular gaming setup thanks to its well-considered features, sturdy construction, and attention to detail.

Montech KING 95 Mid Tower ATX Gaming Case

The Montech KING 95 Mid Tower ATX Gaming Case can upgrade your gaming setup and satisfy the demands of both casual and enthusiast gamers. It is a masterwork of design and utility. In addition to showcasing your high-performance components, the case's gorgeous tempered glass side panel gives your gaming setup a refined look. At the forefront of versatility is motherboard compatibility for Micro-ATX, Mini-ITX, and ATX, giving consumers the freedom to select the perfect form factor for their system. The Montech KING 95 is made to accept 190mm ATX PSUs, so it can handle configurations that require a lot of power. This guarantees a dependable and effective power source for your gaming setup. Its dynamic lighting features are what really make this gaming case unique. The dynamic lighting features of this game case, which enable a staggering 29 possible combinations and 6 distinct dynamic light modes, are what really make it stand out. You may customize the lighting choices to suit your preference for a clean and understated look or a bright and striking display to make your gaming experience more unique. This gaming case combines functionality and style, with cable management features that maintain a neat and tidy interior while optimizing cooling and airflow. With the Montech KING 95, gamers can enjoy a luxury housing for their high-performance components while still maintaining the ideal mix between style and substance. With the Montech KING 95 Mid Tower ATX Gaming Case, you can upgrade your gaming setup and enter a world where design and function coexist together.

Innovation in Every Frame

For better ventilation, KING 95 offers a revolutionary adjustable side fan bracket that can be turned to the front. This design offers unparalleled customization possibilities and adaptability in terms of cooling performance and aesthetics.

Defend Your PC with Embedded Filters

The KING 95 has top, side, and bottom panels that are all readily detachable and have their dust filters. This careful planning guarantees that your construction will always seem clean and well-maintained.
